5A1F4B4A.Line1.6D03F: Elias had a talent for persuasion. Convenient trait for a Horadrim, given our dealings, but he could be...relentless when he wanted something. Even cruel.

8E083E4E.Line5.6D03F: They will bring out the worst in each other.

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: In that way, he and Lilith are similar. Suffering, bloodshed...to them these are means to an end.
